caption: The food was excellent in taste and presentation. The customer service was excellent and there was a definitely a homely feeling.I would definitely recommend to others!
Such a beautiful place to sit and eat and drink with the family everything I mean everything was absolutely wonderful.

Very cute shop nice and cozy very personable service the food was excellent we had the corn soup, the shrimp and fried bake and the house stew mahi mahi each dish tasted home made we were so happy with everything we ordered additional to take home; We cannot wait to come back and try some other items from their menu soon!
excellent food and service. comfortable courtyard dining
This outstanding restaurant serves tasty Carribean dishes that go beyond one’s expectations. Unique flavors and excellent service.

Ordered takeout last night and the food was absolutely delicious! My family is pescatarian, and there were so many options for us. We went with pumpkin soup (fantastic!), chickpea bake, veg roti, saltfish cook up and sides of rice and peas and fried plantains. There are four of us (2 adults/6 yo, 11 yo) and we were stuffed! Portions were all decent and prices were reasonable. We vacation in the Caribbean once a year and Stella’s is totally authentic. A taste of the islands right here in Brooklyn!  I toured the space briefly when I picked up my order, and loved it! Long and narrow with exposed brick and vivid colors, uptempo music, modern and cheery vibe, great tented garden space out back with a half dozen picnic tables painted light blue. Oh, and the staff? Super friendly. Dwayne treated me like a regular even though it was my first time there and I was only doing takeout! I will definitely be back, with the family next time, to dine in! What a great addition to the neighborhood!
Hands down best jerk chicken EVER
Great family owned place that serves delicious Caribbean food with their special flare!  I eat here often and I'm yet to be disappointed!
slightly pricey but phew, that was good

Where do I start?  From the moment I walked in, I knew this is where I needed to be haha!!  Seriously though, highly recommend, friendly staff, food is VERY rich in flavor!  You’ll see me back again, for sure!
Great food, very friendly service, all around good experience

Terrific new Caribbean restaurant in the South Slope! Portion sizes were great and the service was efficient and friendly. Their back patio is extremely warm with great ventilation, so my family felt very safe. On the whole, they took all the Covid precautions very seriously. We will definitely be returning in the near future!
Delicious food, big portions. The bread pudding dessert was really amazing. Strong COVID precautions in place; we felt very safe in the backyard and the heat lamps kept us comfortable.
Best food we've had in ages. We ordered (for takeout) the jerk salmon and coconut salmon. The fish was fresh and juicy, the portions generous.
Baked jerk chicken and sweet plantains were delicious. And a nice tented backyard with side open for ventilation.
Great food. Fun, safe and comfortable backyard dinning.

Highly recommended! Amazing food, bursting with authentic Caribbean flavors, and great service in a clean, cozy, well-spaced, warm backyard setting. Everything I've had at Stella's is delicious; some of my favorites: the ackee tostones, mussels (that sauce is something special), codfish fritters, escovietch snapper with festival, coconut salmon, oxtails, jerk chicken, and curry shrimp with coconut rice. This place is a must try, you won't be disappointed!

The oxtail is so good! Will be back to try the chicken , I heard it ranks amongst the best in Brooklyn. Outdoor seating in the back gives each table tons of space so people can feel comfortable taking off their masks and eating. Took a picture of my oxtail takeout order.
Pretty good soft fresh chicken and the lamb was good as well. Chicken wings is a must try. I recommend coming her you will love it

So glad we found this restaurant in the neighborhood. Food is authentic and top notch. The staff is super friendly and helpful, they really took the time to make sure you were comfortable and had everything you needed. The backyard had heating lamps so we were warm enough to dine outdoors. If you’re looking for amazing Jamaican food this is your spot.

Great addition to the neighborhood! My husband and I ordered Christmas dinner from here and it was one of the best meals we’ve ever had! The bread pudding and rum sauce was incredible. Thanks for a helping make Christmas delicious (and easy) this year!
The pasta with shrims was very delisious and desert- bread pudding was perfect! Great job, guys!!! Thank you!!!!

We just tried Stella's for the first time tonight and it was delicious. The staff is friendly and the restaurant is upbeat and lively. Having dinner there definitely lifted our spirits during these hard times, it felt like a mini-escape. We'll be back again to enjoy the awesome food!
Heated beautiful back patio! Amazing food. Totally worth it.
Delicious food! We had the jerk chicken and shrimp curry, both were great. They have a nice backyard too with space heaters and tents. Friendly service too. We’ll be back again!

Love this place. Smiling welcoming owners, good music, and delicious food! I had Goat Roti - hearty and perfect for chilly days. Ginger lemonade got real kick, for real ginger lovers) make sure to get banana bread- amazing dessert! it is made with rum and comes with ice cream, yaam! Large backyard is open and rain-proof.

Walking into this place, you feel at home almost immediately. The chef and owner, Dwayne, greeted us with delight. The backyard is cozy, lively, and warm. Filled with murals, lights and colorful flags.  Shemmel, our sever, recommended us to try the oxtail and jerk chicken -the two most popular dishes.  The chicken IS probably the best jerk chicken in Brooklyn. The sauce is spicy, flavorful, and carries weight to the dish. It tastes exactly how jerk is supposed to be -all soul, all flavor, not holding back on the spices that make it unique and special. The oxtail is tender and has great flavor as well. Even the side of rice and beans has a very unique, home-feeling flavor to them.  We had a very lovely dinner here and encourage everybody to dine here and support an amazing local business!

Excellent food! My wife and I stumbled upon this place on Halloween, and decided to take a chance.  This discovery happened to be one of the most delightful experiences we’ve had in quite a while!  We’re vegetarian, so we tried the Pumpkin corn soup, and the vegetable roti, and now we can’t wait to go back again. We met the owners Duane and Vera, and quickly understood that the magic in their food is reflected in their likeable and authentic personalities.

Exceptionally delicious!! The shrimp and grits I had was divine. Served perfectly with a ball of cheesy grits in the center surrounded by juicy plump shrimps. The sauce is well balanced with garlic, hint of scotch bonnet (Maybe?), herbs and magic(definitely)! I can't wait to go back and try the rest of the menu. Service is super friendly and warm. A really wonderful addition to the neighborhood.
Absolutely great food! Yummy!!!

Amazing addition to the South Slope neighborhood. Tried the jerk chicken, pumpkin corn soup and house made punch. Everything was fresh and super tasty. Will be back soon to taste more of menu. They also have a great backyard for outdoor dining.
